reviews.review:
Absolute Empfehlung!
Eines der besten Spiele allerzeiten in meinen Augen. Man kann mit dem Kauf eigentlich nichts falsch machen.
Der Singel Player ist großartig, und Unterhaltsam. Der Humor des Spiels ist schon wie in Teil1 über jeden zweifel erhaben.
Und die Multiplayer Kampagnen sind zusammen mit einem Freund auch ein absoluter Spass garant!
Времена когда кальве делали хорошие игры
Игра для тех у кого больше 100iq
这游戏好玩呀，但我觉得我好菜，找路好费劲，
Ein muss, für jeden, der Puzzle-Spiele mag!

Pretty much one of the best and most influential PC games that were released.

Also great in co-op !
this game is so good, i like it so much and when portal 3 appers?
传送门都不玩，还叫用过steam吗？
游戏玩法非常有创意，双人模式欢乐很多，只是我那个傻屌儿子@RJP有点笨容易拖进度
игра супер проходил её 6 раз не надоедает но когда играешь в совместную игру не советую играть с левым чуваком играйте только со своими друзьями
This Is Defenity One of the Best Games I ever Played, Recommended to all ages and all genders
Dobra gra. Lubię ją i jest bardzo fajna. Polecam.
아 영어 닉네임 아니면 같이 게임못하는걸 지금와서야 알았네요..너무 늦었다는 ㅠ 산지 3년만에 처음 엔딩봤습니다 ^^ 친구 방해하는거 재밌네요
Jedna z najlepszych gier w których trzeba coś pomyśleć.
I love this game! It makes me laugh aloud when I replay and know all the jokes by heart!

游戏很有意思，传送门的游戏模式非常独特，你可以通过学习来使用传送门和各种激光，并以此通过一道道关卡。
总体而言是一款解谜类关卡制游戏，关卡设计理念新颖，游戏体验好。
游戏缺点是部分人群连续长时间玩时会产生晕眩状态，包括我在内。
It's a classic. The levels and mechanics are solid, and the puzzles are well put together.
Fun game, can be challenging at points. Then again I am pretty dumb.
One of the best series ever. Very challenging, in a good way. You will be very amazed at the depth the story goes into.
good gaem took me a couple years to not be scared of GlaDos
I love this game - I feel like this helps you think in terms that can help you write recursive functions if you are a programmer - think in portals. Plus the coop is pretty awesome.

This is the closest we'll ever get to Half-Life 3.

Or, maybe we need to think with portals?
Это изумительная игра! Лучшая игра Valve! Мне больше нечего сказать. Это 12/10!
Really Good Game,Great Graphics (Especially For A Game Made THAT Year)

Bu oyunun bu kadar güzel, keyifli, eğlenceli olabileceğini düşünmemiştim. Tek oyuncu hikayesini izin günümde bir çırpıda oynamış bulundum. Bununla birlikte ister ana hikaye ile bağlantılı co-op özelliği olsun, ister steam atölye desteği olsun oyunun keyfini katlayacağını düşünüyorum. Günümüzde bile gayet kaliteli ve kendini kesinlikle oynatır. Ayrıca böyle güzel bir oyun bu fiyata başka yerde bulunmaz gönül rahatlığı ile alıp oynayabilirsiniz.
Macht immer wieder Spaß ehrlich gsagt
Portal and Portal 2 were the best thing Valve has done since the Half-Life series
I lloovveee portal but you need to have more multiplayer people
This is an amazing game. Very good story and gameplay.
Portal 2 is the best game ever!

Also Portal 2 ist ein gutes spiel besser als das aller erste Portal. Das aller erste Portal ist müll warum weil es zu kurz ist die Story im aller ersten Portal zu kurz ist aber Portal 2 ist besser ein schöne lange Story und Episoden das spiel Portal 2 ist besser ich Empfehle das geile spiel an jeden hier auf steam
Если честно, не ожидал такого годного продолжения культового Portal! 10/10
Portal 2 is this very hard puzzle game that is very rewarding with its unique characters and jokes.
very cool great game awesome cool yes
Игра просто супер: сюжет,атмосфера да ещё повышает IQ
Игра топ особено если играть в двоем
Очень хотим увидеть продолжение! Думаю от третьей части ни кто не отказался бы!!!
yes. yes. good game. very likey
Müthiş bir puzzle oyunu. Ayrıca mizahı da çok güzel.
Игра о х у е н н а я! Хачу ещё!
This game is amazing, and I recommend it for anyone new to steam!
